title: Sono Yubi Dake ga Shitte Iru - Novel Updates
author: Kannagi Satoru
description:
Vol.1:
Sono Yubi Dake ga Shitteiru (The Lonely Ring Finger)

Vol.2:
Hidarite wa Kare no Yume wo Miru (The Left Hand Dreams of Him)

Vol.3:
Kusuri Yubi wa Chinmoku suru (The Ring Finger Falls Silent)

Vol.4:
Sorete Yubiwa wa Kokuhaku suru (The Ring Will Confess His Love)

Vol.5:
Sono Yubi Dake wa Nemuranai (Only That Ring Finger Will Sleep)>
